title: StarNinjaTech
author: StarNinjaTech
content: I am hiring IT infrastructure help for a small startupThe role is:1) Setting up software on VPS servers2) Answering my questions 1 on 1 to fix issuesI need the following skills/knowledge:1) Linux, Debian & Ubuntu based2) Wordpress, backend technical focusThe role is part-time for cryptocurrency.Email me: StarNinjaTech@proton.me
